lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The open-ended and media-independent system allows users to incorporate existing and emerging technologies, including erasable optical disks, high-density magnetic media, fiber optics and even artificial intelligence, is expected to sell in the 700,000 dlr range.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Kodak said the optical disy system 6800 is a write-once/ready-many-times type its Mass Memory Division will market on a limited basis later this year and in quantity in 1988.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The objective of Kodak's "new vision" communications campaign, it added, is to inform others of the company's commitment to the business and industrial sector.
